          <title>
            <string language="es">Los órdenes de los insectos</string>
            <string language="en">The orders of insects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ordnungen der Insekte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les commandes des insectes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As ordens dos insetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli ordini degli insetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι κατατάξεις των εντόμων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe estudiar cómo se clasifican los insectos y en qué órdenes se encuentran agrupados.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must study how insects are classified and in which orders they are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Insectos</string>
            <string language="en">Insects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer studieren 
muß, wie Insekte eingestuft werden und in, welchen Ordnungen sie 
enthalten sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit étudier 
comment des insectes sont classifiés et dans quelles commandes ils 
sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve estudar como os 
insetos são classificados e em que ordens são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve studiare come gli 
insetti sono classificati ed in quali ordini sono inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να μελετήσει 
πώς τα έντομα είναι ταξινομημένα και σε ποιες κατατάξεις 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
